acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

createAPOffer(address,address,uint256,ui.details: Setting an expiry of 0 means the offer never expires

params.expiry: The timestamp after which the offer is considered expired
params.fundingVault: The address of the vault where the liquidity will be withdrawn from, if set to 0, the AP will deposit the base asset directly
params.incentivesRatesRequested: The desired incentives per input token per second to fill the offer
params.incentivesRequested: The incentives requested by the AP in offer to fill the offer
params.quantity: The total amount of the base asset to be withdrawn from the funding vault
params.targetVault: The address of the vault where the liquidity will be deposited

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

MIN_CAMPAIGN_DURATION().notice: The minimum time a campaign must run for before someone can be allocated into it

allocate a specific quantity of a given offer
